name: Flint
headline: AI personalized learning for schools
description: Flint is an AI platform for schools. With Flint, schools can use AI to provide personalized learning for every student.

founders.name: Sohan Choudhury, Founder
founders.description: Helping K-12 embrace AI. 2nd time founder.

## Flint is an all-in-one AI platform built for schools. We go beyond software to support administrators at every step.
  * ![Justin Cerenzie headshot](https://framerusercontent.com/images/xMarsOF7QpJ5d25b0x6lLQ8IT8.png)
### Justin Cerenzia
Chair for Teaching & Learning at The Episcopal Academy
"Working with the Flint team has been nothing short of **exceptional**. This isn't a team that sits behind screens all day; they visited us in person, gathered feedback, and **improved the product to better suit our needs**. It's one thing to introduce a tool that people like, but it's another to introduce one that prompts new ways of thinking and adds meaningful value to the educational process."
"Most platforms focus solely on either teacher or student, but **Flint** **explicitly caters to the relationship between educators and learners**. ## Flint is an all-in-one AI platform built for schools. We go beyond software to support administrators at every step.
  * ![Justin Cerenzie headshot⟨109⟩]
### Justin Cerenzia
Chair for Teaching & Learning at The Episcopal Academy
"Working with the Flint team has been nothing short of **exceptional**. This isn't a team that sits behind screens all day; they visited us in person, gathered feedback, and **improved the product to better suit our needs**. It's one thing to introduce a tool that people like, but it's another to introduce one that prompts new ways of thinking and adds meaningful value to the educational process."
"Most platforms focus solely on either teacher or student, but **Flint** **explicitly caters to the relationship between educators and learners**. Flint is more than just a tool—it's a partner in the classroom that aids in facilitating valuable retrieval practice through immediate feedback. Flint doesn't just make our lives easier; it **makes us more effective educators and helps students learn more effectively**."
  * ![Torrey Williams headshot⟨110⟩]
### Torrey Williams
Chief Information Officer at The Westminster Schools
"The experience of working with the Flint team has been one of **true partnership**. They've updated the platform to best suit our needs, and are helping us prepare students for the world given how the use of AI tools has grown exponentially. We wanted to make sure we could use AI in a way that was **managed and secure** , and using an open platform just didn't fit the bill."
"I believe many of the teachers who now use Flint initially had no true basis for understanding what AI means. With Flint, they have been able to not just **learn more about AI** , but use it to **foster better learning**. After Flint enhanced learning and operational efficiency at the Upper School, we broadened the availability of the tool to students at the Middle School."
  * ![Torrey Williams headshot⟨111⟩]
### Elizabeth Brumbaugh
Director of Learning, Innovation & Design at The Harker School
"Working with the Flint Team has been one of the **best customer service experiences I’ve ever had in EdTech**. They’re responsive and authentic making my ability to help teachers implement seamless. The Flint team has worked with us on recurring training and feedback sessions with faculty every 3 weeks, which has helped drive adoption."
"Teachers are loving the **individual and group feedback** that Flint provides, with accompanying supplemental activities. The administrivia of teaching is significantly reduced, and the **learning can occur at deeper levels** , truly leveraging our teachers’ real talents across subject areas ranging from English to Computer Science."

#### LMS and SIS integrations

Inappropriate messages sent to the AI (language related to violence, harassment, threats, self-harm, sexual content, etc.) are automatically flagged for administrator review.

School admins can see every message that any users (students, teachers, etc.) send back and forth with AI activities on Flint.

Flint uses Claude 3.5 Sonnet in combination with translation, code-based math calculations, and web search for the highest possible accuracy.

generated_description:
### Flint: Revolutionizing Education with AI-Powered Learning

**Overview**
Flint is a promising new startup founded in 2023, based in San Francisco, and is part of the Y Combinator Batch S23. The company’s mission is simple yet ambitious: to leverage artificial intelligence to create personalized learning experiences for students across schools. With a small but dedicated team of eight, Flint aims to redefine how education is delivered, making it more adaptive and effective.

**What They Offer**
At its core, Flint is an AI platform designed to enhance the learning journey of each student. It provides tailored assistance across various subjects, ensuring students can progress at their own pace and receive immediate feedback. With features ranging from AI-driven math problem-solving to language learning conversations, Flint is engineered to be an indispensable tool for educators and students alike.

**User-Centric Design**
What sets Flint apart is its focus not just on technology but on user experience. Teachers can customize the AI’s engagement according to specific learning objectives and shed light on individual student challenges. This level of personalization allows for a more engaging classroom dynamic and empowers students to take ownership of their learning.

**Current Features**
Flint boasts an impressive suite of capabilities, including:
- **Real-time AI feedback** for various subjects including math, science, English, and more.
- **Customizable AI roles**, enabling teachers to shape interactions to fit their classroom needs.
- **Support for diverse languages** allowing students from different backgrounds to benefit from its offerings.
- **Integrations with popular LMS platforms** to streamline adoption in educational institutions.

**Market Position and Vision**
With its unique approach to personalized education, Flint is positioned at the intersection of artificial intelligence and edtech. The company’s goal is not just to implement AI as a tool, but to enhance the teaching process and to provide immediate, helpful interactions that nurture students’ growth.

**Why It Matters**
In a world where education is too often one-size-fits-all, Flint recognizes that each learner is unique. By focusing on personalized experiences, Flint helps educators cultivate a classroom environment where every student can flourish. This aligns perfectly with a growing demand for innovative, engaging, and effective educational solutions.

**Explore More**
To learn more about Flint’s offerings and how it can enhance personalized learning in your school, visit their website: [Flint](http://flintk12.com/). 

---

Flint stands out as a forward-thinking player in the educational landscape, tackling one of the greatest challenges in teaching today: making education work for every learner. With its emphasis on personalization and interactivity, it's worth keeping an eye on as it evolves.
